description: Main entry point of a Flutter application, setting up app initialization, providers, routing, theming, and core app logic.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter application, managing theme, routing, and provider setup.

classes.name: _MyAppState
classes.description: State class for MyApp, handling initialization of API client and providers, and building the widget tree.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that initializes Flutter bindings and environment variables, then runs the app.

methods.name: _initializeProviders
methods.description: Asynchronously initializes various application providers such as auth, settings, games, and leaderboard.
